fields.name: Red Hair Dye
fields.description: The instructions on these dyes suggest leaving the colour on for 15 minutes, but from our own extensive use of the product we’ve discovered it is perfectly safe to leave them in for up to 2 hours.

fields.name: Desert Sage Smudge Stick
fields.description:
Our Desert Sage Smudge Sticks are hand made in New Mexico from the finest quality ingredients.
The end of the stick is lit with a fireproof dish held underneath to catch any ash, the smoke is then spread around the area

fields.name: California Sage
fields.description: Our California Sage is hand made with high quality ingredients. Sourced from California and 100% natural, these smudging sticks can be hung upside down in dark room until they are fully burned out

fields.name: Rainforest Incense Sticks
fields.description: Handrolled with the finest quality fragrances, our Rainforest incense sticks have the most wonderful and beautiful sent of the rainforest.

fields.name: Sage & Sweetgrass
fields.description: 100% pure, all natural, wild-crafted and hand-picked, our Sage & Sweetgrass smudge sticks calm the mind, allowing one to meditate more fully and be able to focus on the task at hand.

fields.name: Black Pepper Oil
fields.description: Black Pepper Essential Oil is obtained by steam distillation of the seeds. Black Pepper oil maybe used in aromatherapy for aching muscles, arthritis, constipation, poor circulation and much more.

fields.name: Citronella
fields.description: Our Citronella oil has a fresh, sweet and fruity aroma. In aromatherapy, Citronella can be used for excessive perspiration, fatigue, headaches and oily skin. It's also an excellent insect repellant.

fields.name: Clary Sage
fields.description: Clary Sage Essential Oil is extracted from the flowering tops and leaves. This essential oil has a green balsamic aromatic smell and is mildly antiseptic. An uplifting tonic that is warming and relaxing, Clear Sage is best used to fight fatigue.

fields.name: Ylang Ylang
fields.description: Ylang Ylang essential oil is extracted from the freshly picked flower of the tropical tree. Ylang Ylang Essential Oil has a sweet potent floral smell that affects the mind more the body. It is also rejuvenating for skin and hair

fields.name: Lavender Essential Oil
fields.description: Lavender Essential Oil is extracted from the leaves of the evergreen shrub. This essential oil is one of the most commonly used. It is both relaxing and stimulating, a powerful antiseptic and healer as it calms, refreshes, invigorates and lifts the spirits.

fields.name: Geranium Rose Oil
fields.description: Geranium Rose Oil has a rich Rosey fragrance. Used to brighten mood, reduce wrinkles and help calm and reduce nervous tension. It also helps to promote restless sleep

fields.name: Hemp Oil
fields.description: Our unique formula is rich in natural ingredients! Hemp oil can help to relieve body pains, aching and sore muscles, stiffness and inflammation and also helps to balance skin tone.

fields.name: Chamomile Roman Essential Oil
fields.description: Chamomile is one of the oldest British medicinal and beauty herbs. In aromatherapy it is used for stress, sleeplessness, headaches, rashes, Insect bites, burns, cuts, toothache and menstrual or menopausal problems.

fields.name: Pathwork Jacket
fields.description: Hippie festival jacket made from 100% hemp with hood, zip and button up fastening

fields.name: Magicians Waistcoat
fields.description: Magicians Multicoloured Waistcoat made from 100% fairtrade cotton. Double pointed collar with coconut button fastening.

fields.name: Farmers Wife Pinafore
fields.description: Stonewashed Cotton Corduroy Dungaree style Pinafore Dress with waist and back pockets. Adjustable straps and coconut button fastening.

fields.name: Pinarees Dress
fields.description: Heavy cotton dungaree style dress. with beautiful crochet and embroidery detailing and coconut button fastenings.

fields.name: Pathwork Pants
fields.description: 100% Hemp Pathwork Pants with draw string for fastening and deep back and side pockets.

fields.name: Pathwork Shorts
fields.description: 50% Hemp 50% Cotton, these patchwork shorts come with cargo style pockets and an elasticated waistband.

fields.name: Pathwork Skirt
fields.description: Stretchy cotton pathwork skirt made form 100% recycled fabrics.

fields.name: Lumberjack Shirt
fields.description: Soft cotton flannel shirt with side breast pockets, grandad collar and coconut buttons.
